title: Start Here
description: Welcome to Backlogged - the game for developers. Click the Get Started button to start your journey as a developer!

title: Get into flow
description: You're starting to get the hang of this development work. Keep up the great work!

title: Add a splash of colour
description: Still here eh? I appreciate the dedication! Now it's time to get to work. The site could use a little colour.

title: Reflect on progress so far
description: You've accomplished so much so far. Take a moment to think about what you've done so far

title: Improve progress bar
description: The progress bar is looking great, but a little jumpy. Let's smooth out that progress indicator.

title: Test new progress bar
description: Let's have a look at how our new progress bar is looking
